name: ListItemIconComponent

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription: The icon name passed to the `c8yIcon` directive.
inputsClass.description: The icon name passed to the c8yIcon directive.

inputsClass.name: status
inputsClass.rawdescription: A status to change the color of the icon.
inputsClass.description: A status to change the color of the icon.

description:
An icon to display on a list item. Use it with content projection.

Example :
<c8y-li>
  <c8y-li-icon="rocket"></c8y-li-icon>
</c8y-li>
rawdescription:
An icon to display on a list item. Use it with content projection.

```html
<c8y-li>
  <c8y-li-icon="rocket"></c8y-li-icon>
</c8y-li>
```
